TextView.android:text: Add New DCS/BMC Center Visit Report
Format for Onsite DCS/BMC Centre visit report for NLMs
Average Procurement Price at DCS/BMC centre (Rs. /Kg) in one payment cycle (Weekly/fortnightly/monthly)
Av. Procurement Price (Rs./Kg) paid to farmers
Total Amount Paid/Quantity of milk received
Additional facilities available: (Lab equipments, Solar heater etc.)
Chemical/Microbiological Test Parameters conducted by dairy lab
Staff strength at DCS/BMC Centre(including their level of understanding and knowledge)
Training of milk tester, BMC operator and Secretary
Milk Payment cycle and last payments date to milk producers

Farmer’s interaction/feedback
(Cattle purchase, breeding, nutrition, training, competitor’s price, credit facility, milk price, feed availability etc.)
Asset with Date, time preferably with geo-location
